description: I developed the website and mint dapp for Shinzo, an anime-art themed NFT collection.
I audited Black Dust's Minting Smart Contract in consideration to security and useability. The contracts allowed users to mint, refund, burn and stake NFTs.

I developed an NFT minting smart contract for Pixel Puppers, an NFT project. Using ERC-721A & Merkle Trees, I optimised the contract for gas fees. I also ran extensive testing to make sure the contract worked as intended.
I developed a Smart Contract and Minting Dapp for HustleFam, a small NFT collection of 247.

I built NFT Utility / lity.gg, a platform to display NFT collection analytics for traders and NFT-ethusiasts. It is simply a CRUD app that displays data from curated collections from a database into a React application.
I was the lead developer for Abstract Realm, an NFT project. Working closely with the team, I built the project website and provided advice for the project in terms of development.
I wrote an audit report for the Gen-1 Avatars Smart Contract. I evaluated the contract and tests in terms of security, decentralization and useability.
I built the Minting Dapp and Smart Contract for Mysterium, an NFT collection.
I built a simple CRUD task manager app using the MERN stack. In this app, users are able to view their tasks, create new tasks, update and delete them.
